name: NSToolbarDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods implemented by toolbar delegates to configure the toolbar and respond to changes.

items.name: func toolbar(NSToolbar, itemForItemIdentifier: NSToolbarItem.Identifier, willBeInsertedIntoToolbar: Bool) -> NSToolbarItem?
items.desc: Sent to request a new toolbar item; returns a toolbar item of the identified kind for the specified toolbar.

items.name: func toolbarAllowedItemIdentifiers(NSToolbar) -> [NSToolbarItem.Identifier]
items.desc: Sent to discover the allowed item identifiers for a toolbar.

items.name: func toolbarDefaultItemIdentifiers(NSToolbar) -> [NSToolbarItem.Identifier]
items.desc: Sent to discover the default item identifiers for a toolbar.

items.name: func toolbarSelectableItemIdentifiers(NSToolbar) -> [NSToolbarItem.Identifier]
items.desc: Sent to discover the selectable item identifiers for a toolbar.

items.name: func toolbarWillAddItem(Notification)
items.desc: Sent just before a new item is added to a toolbar.

items.name: func toolbarDidRemoveItem(Notification)
items.desc: Sent just after an item has been removed from a toolbar.
